gw.api.util

Class DisplayableException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException
            • gw.api.util.DisplayableException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasErrorInfo, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TerminatedException

    public class DisplayableException
extends com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException
    Throw instances of this exception if you want a message to display in the UI using the standard error reporting format.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DisplayableException(com.guidewire.pl.system.locale.DisplayKey message)
      Create a new DisplayableException with a message obtained by looking up the given display key in the display properties.
      DisplayableException(com.guidewire.pl.system.locale.DisplayKey message, java.lang.Object[] msgArgs)
      Create a new DisplayableException with a message obtained by looking up the given display key in the display properties and then substituting in the given message arguments.
      DisplayableException(com.guidewire.pl.system.locale.DisplayKey message, java.lang.Object[] msgArgs, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Create a new DisplayableException with a message and cause.
      DisplayableException(com.guidewire.pl.system.locale.DisplayKey message, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Create a new DisplayableException with a message and cause.
      DisplayableException(java.lang.String message)
      Create a new DisplayableException with the given message.
      DisplayableException(java.lang.String[] messages)
      Create a new DisplayableException with the given messages.
      DisplayableException(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Create a new DisplayableException with the given message and cause.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DisplayableException

        public DisplayableException(java.lang.String message)
        Create a new DisplayableException with the given message.

      • DisplayableException

        public DisplayableException(java.lang.String[] messages)
        Create a new DisplayableException with the given messages. The messages are concatenated, joined by newlines.

      • DisplayableException

        public DisplayableException(java.lang.String message,
                            java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Create a new DisplayableException with the given message and cause.

      • DisplayableException

        public DisplayableException(com.guidewire.pl.system.locale.DisplayKey message)
        Create a new DisplayableException with a message obtained by looking up the given display key in the display properties.

      • DisplayableException

        public DisplayableException(com.guidewire.pl.system.locale.DisplayKey message,
                            java.lang.Object[] msgArgs)
        Create a new DisplayableException with a message obtained by looking up the given display key in the display properties and then substituting in the given message arguments.

      • DisplayableException

        public DisplayableException(com.guidewire.pl.system.locale.DisplayKey message,
                            java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Create a new DisplayableException with a message and cause. The message is obtained by looking up the given display key in the display properties.

      • DisplayableException

        public DisplayableException(com.guidewire.pl.system.locale.DisplayKey message,
                            java.lang.Object[] msgArgs,
                            java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Create a new DisplayableException with a message and cause. The message is obtained by looking up the given display key in the display properties and then substituting in the given message arguments.
